title: Quiver
description:
Leather quiver. The quiver has two pouches for arrows formed by the bending around, towards the rear, of the sides of the piece of leather where they were bound in place by other strips of the same kind of material. The front of the quiver is decorated with an incised herring-bone pattern.
Condition: Top and bottom missing; binding strips only partially preserved; ripped and dirty.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
